segments.text: Oh , I am not sure I even want to look at this house !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a bit of a fixer-upper . Let ’ s take a look inside .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It doesn ’ t look much better inside this place .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , with a little elbow grease and paint , you could spruce it up a bit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are hardly any windows in here , and that makes it really gloomy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let ’ s go check out the kitchen . The printout says that it is quite large .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at those broken tile countertops and the peeling wallpaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe the master suite has some redeeming qualities . Follow me , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps we should move on to the next listing .
segments.speaker: S2
